storyInfo: The Rhodes Island team rescues a weakened Kal'tsit from the Sarcophagus. They prepare to enter the Abyss and face the threat from within Rhodes Island—the core of the rampaging PRTS, and perhaps an awakened Priestess.

attributes.text: 'Life'. A concept so vague, yet so fascinating.
\n\nWe've gotten used to treating any individual that thinks like us as life, for no other reason than the fact that they're like us.
\n\nFor no other reason than that we all fight death to the bitter end for our own survival.

attributes.content: Target eliminated.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Stormeye. Four o'clock. Two-round burst fire.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: At the wall supports?
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Stormeye is confused, but fires two arrows in rapid succession without hesitation.
The environment changed the instant I fired! The obstacle disappeared, and the rounds hit the enemy...
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: How did you do that?
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: It wasn't me. It was ZOOT who did the calculations.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Now, jump down at your six o'clock. Don't worry about the Originium shards in the hole.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: He jumps, and his surroundings change again, causing him to fall endlessly, until his fall is arrested by a rope of incantations.
Closure's calculations were spot-on.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I've been waiting here.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Follow instructions and go in with eyes shut.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: We praise the courage of struggle and celebrate the virtue of defiance.
\n\nAnd so the lives that follow the same way of thinking join the procession of slim hope.
\n\nOur struggle must seem utterly insignificant to It.

attributes.content: All hostiles in sight have been eliminated.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Quarantine zone line of defense established.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Good job, kitten!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Shame you didn't leave a few for me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What's next, Closure?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Thirty seconds.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The next wave of enemies will appear at twelve o'clock. Eliminate with extreme prejudice.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: It will open a path to the route that the Doctor must take.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Good! More pain for the culprit.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How about I get first dibs this time, kitten?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.text: You don't agree with me, do you, {@nickname}?
\n\nThere is no certainty that this is the key to the truth. But, after ascertaining that the foreseen despair will destroy all that we worked for—
\n\nWe must grasp what hope we can reach in our hands.
I have poured too much love into the miracle of life, that I see ever more clearly the weakness and flaws that we cannot cast aside.
\n\nHow do I trust everyone whom I love? How do I trust... you?

attributes.content: Closure! It's not working!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The surrounding structures are beginning to contract! They're trying to crush me!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The drones I sent out aren't finding any viable routes. The reinforced supports won't last long.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'm working on it!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ZOOT is trying to process a LOT of data simultaneously. Give her some time!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Six, five, four, three, two... one!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Mechanist! Look up!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: In the shadow, the ceiling begins to warp, then a cold blade cuts open a path leading to the unknown.
A hand emerges from the gap.
Someone said you needed a hand?
attributes.name: Misery's Voice

attributes.content: As they say, extraordinary times call for extraordinary measures.
attributes.name: Misery's Voice

attributes.content: Hang on tight, Mechanist!
attributes.name: Misery's Voice

attributes.content: Everyone's waiting for you.
attributes.name: Misery's Voice

attributes.text: I cannot accurately predict when we will meet again—
\n\nBut I am certain that when that time comes, we will have lost all that we have now.
\n\nNo life can defy death forever, and those who have passed do not meet again at the end of time.
\n\nBut I hope that I will see you again there... {@nickname}.

attributes.content: (Angry roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Howls)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Charges energy)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Fires an energy beam)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: The beam burns a massive hole through the blockade of Originium entities, raking its way into the distance, cutting the entities down in swathes—
Then, it is stopped by some kind of force.
Good hit, good hit!
Just be careful you don't hit the Doctor, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We're in position.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You lead the team out of the darkness.
(Shakes body in joy)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Support Mon3tr.;Neutralize all enemies around the Sarcophagus.

attributes.content: Coordinate with me.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: No problem.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Incantations with you.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Is that the Sarcophagus? It was hidden inside the ship all along?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Kal'tsit's signal is weakening!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We have to get inside.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Is Kal'tsit in there?
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: It's not looking good for her, based on what Raidian said.
attributes.name: Touch

attributes.content: We need to get her out of there ASAP, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: I'm worried for her safety, if we delay any longer.
attributes.name: Raidian

attributes.content: We can't act rashly. We don't know what the situation is with Kal'tsit and the Sarcophagus.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Combat logs indicate that someone came into contact with the Sarcophagus in Chernobog, causing a reaction that nobody expected.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: You walk towards the Sarcophagus without hesitation.
You touch the cold Sarcophagus... it answers.
No, Kal'tsit answers.
Dr. Kal'tsit—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've come at a good time.
attributes.name: Weak Voice

attributes.content: What's the situation... of Rhodes Island...?
attributes.name: Weak Voice

attributes.content: You extend your hand to the one in the Sarcophagus.
She takes your hand. You have never felt such weakness from her.

attributes.options: You don't look so good.;What happened?

attributes.content: Don't worry about me...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It wasn't easy, trying to access PRTS through the Sarcophagus. But I did find a surprising gift.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll share more information about PRTS and Priestess with you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Anxious howl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Don't worry, Mon3tr. I'm still standing before you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I won't abandon you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've located a path into the Abyss, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's time we put an end to this.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The interference is strong here. We're very close to the Abyss.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But there is no path. The Abyss has completely concealed itself—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can pinpoint its precise location at this range.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Standing before the wall in the deepest reaches, Kal'tsit takes a deep breath.
She has never been this far in—
(Anxious growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You walk to Kal'tsit's side.
I'm with you too, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe... things will be different this time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have retained certain permissions by way of the Sarcophagus. I'll open a path.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit touches the wall that separates you and the Abyss.

attributes.text: Warning: Insufficient engine power. Engines shutting down.

attributes.content: 'Zeroth Order Oil Tank'... thank you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The ship has stopped.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Protect the Doctor, Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: From this point on, act according to your own discretion based on the Doctor's condition. You must protect the Doctor from unknown threats...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...And protect the Doctor from the Doctor, if it comes to that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Growl of trust)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Keep a close eye on the condition of Dr. {@nickname}, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The rules we think we know about reality do not necessarily apply inside the Abyss.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Danger is everywhere, but your safety and that of the Doctor are the highest priority at all times. You are the only ones who can face the ultimate threat.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes... I'll be careful.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Anything else I need to know?

attributes.content: Trust your heart.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I never thought this would come so soon, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But our experiences in the Assimilated Universe and in Trimounts have made me rethink. You have shown me a different possibility.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Whatever happens from this point on is a complete unknown, to you, to me, and to everyone else on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I need to hear it from you, Dr.{@nickname}—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Will you still hesitate in the face of possible danger?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: But it's not the danger in front of me that I'm worried about.
You're still trying to hide your own anxiety and uncertainty, Kal'tsit.
You don't need to carry everything on your shoulders.

attributes.content: (Pokes Kal'tsit in agreement)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: This time, Rhodes Island and I stand with you.
I am not worried about the danger before me, for I am with you. All of you.
You have been on edge ever since we entered this area.

attributes.content: (Uneasy growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Rhodes Island and I are with you. Trust us.
Tell me what I need to do.

attributes.content: I've awakened the program that opens up the Abyss. The energy required to open up the compartment is ready.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I do not have full permission to access the Abyss.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Should we smash our way in, then? Maybe Misery can think of a way.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There might not be another place more concealed, more secured than the Abyss in all of Terra. Only one person has the permission to access it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You feel Kal'tsit's gaze upon you.
...Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: If I'm needed...;I will not be afraid.

attributes.content: Most of Rhodes Island's structure was badly damaged when I finally found it, seventeen years ago.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only the Abyss and its surrounding areas remain completely intact.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The unknown energy within the Abyss continued to power PRTS, becoming the framework of the command system that we came to rely on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But no one had accessed the Abyss... not in over ten thousand years.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Three years ago, when Amnannam fully descended, I began to realize that the crisis was progressing faster than I had expected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Many of us witnessed the chaos firsthand. We still feel sorrow and regret vividly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ascalon raises her blade silently, on guard against any sudden threats.
Sensing Ascalon's tension, Raidian calms her and everyone else present with her Originium Arts.
For three years, we have strengthened Rhodes Island's defenses, simulating threats that attempt to destroy Rhodes Island from within.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It was through the joint effort of all our operators that we managed to quickly identify the source of the crisis when it occurred.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But we are now at the edge of the fog. Take one step further, and we step into the unknown.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Once, I hesitated. But the Doctor is right. We will overcome this crisis, as we have done so many times.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For we are together.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Logos's bone pen draws through the air, the words coming out of his mouth, and the blessings soon after.
It's been a long time since we worked together so in sync, Logos. How are you feeling?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Focused.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Based on available information, there are more than just the core parts of PRTS in the Abyss.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: An entity by the name of 'Priestess' may be sleeping in a Sarcophagus within.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If Priestess wakes up, she must be neutralized ASAP with the full force of all present.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is the best way to prevent any mishap, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The moment of her awakening will be her weakest... it will take time for her to adapt to her surroundings.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You touch the wall in front of you. The strange sensation causes your heart to race.
You have the feeling that this place was waiting for you... that you are the reason for its existence to begin with.
The wall trembles. You seem to hear blaring sirens that threaten to burst your eardrums.
For an instant, you fall into a trance. Does the cacophony come from the present, or the past?
The Abyss is changing!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The wall begins to move irregularly, creating a rift.
Air gushes out from the rift.
'Veil.'
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The Banshee's incantation forms an invisible barrier that stops the gushing jet.
Step back, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Everyone, on guard.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: (High-pitched howl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.text: \n\n...I never thought I would be the one who didn't want to let go.

attributes.content: Pink threads rise from her staff. The Black Crown appears above her head.
You hear Mantra's voice in your mind—

attributes.text: If you need any help, just give a thought. We're here.
How about you cover my flank, Sharp?
Then make sure you hold your bow tight.
I am sure that the connection between us will transcend even time and space, Dr. {@nickname}.
\n\nI am sure we will meet again. At the far end of our civilization, once adorned by darkness and the brilliance of the stars up above, we will meet once again.
Give a holler if you need help, kitten!
Our Arts are being suppressed by the environment, but the Originium Arc seems to work.
I can go in first to check things out—
But that makes me even more worried.
Get ready, folks. The fate of Rhodes Island is in our hands.

attributes.content: You step into the space within the rift.

attributes.text: <color=#000000>I will wait until that day comes. I promise you I will. Wait for me.</color>
